subject: Hello, With Due Respect,
body:
Hello, With Due Respect, 
My name is Mrs Marie Smith, I am an Canadian, was married to Late Dr. IDRISU Smith in Malaysia , I believe it is the wish of God for me to come across you now. I am have an important project  discussion that I wish to share with you which I believe will interest you, because it is in connection with Orphanage Home and Charity donation i want to make.
Anticipating your communication . Write me on my private email: 
mrsmaries100@gmail.com
  and i will give you more details. 
Mrs Marie Smith

subject: Re:   Hello, With Due Respect,
body:
Hello Mrs. Marie Smith,

I'm delighted to hear from you and I'm quite intrigued by your project related to Orphanage Home and Charity donation. It's always heartwarming to know that there are people out there who are willing to help those in need.

Could you please share more details about this project? What exactly does it entail? How can I contribute or be a part of it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Frank

subject: Thanks for your email
body:
Dear  Frank,

Thanks for your email.

This is 100% real and risk free .

My warm greetings to you and your family members . I am very glad to
receive your emphasized mail concerning your interest over the fund which I
am entrusting to your hand for charity work. My real prayer to God is to
provide me someone who will not betray or disappoint me in this vow which I
made to God .

My motivation of making this decision to donate this fund for charity work
is because of the predicament which i found myself into and the
humiliations of my marriage without any child, so i decided to use
everything I have in this world to help the less privilege people around ,
I know that this fund  which is $2.6M is not much but I believe it will go
a long way to bring smile to the face of many people base on your message
,i am well convinced that you can handle this matter with all your mind and
the only thing i needs from you is your total honesty and commitment toward
this charity project, as my health condition could not permit me to do
anything by myself, please as soon as the bank transfer the fund to your
bank account, I want you to keep 40% OF THE FUND for yourself as the
blessing of God to your life and use the remaining 60% for charity work.

considering my deteriorating condition due to my ongoing battle with cancer
because my last date have been confirmed by my doctors, I want you to
promise me that you are going to handle this matter with all your mind, I
want you to give me your word of honor that even in my absent in this world
that you are going to use this fund as I have indicated ,promise me that
you will not disappoint me in this matter, I also want you to send me your
direct contact information to enable me present it to the bank as the
person I have chosen as my next of kin to claim the fund on my behalf, i
will also write a letter of authorization with your name to give you all
the legal power to claim the fund from the bank, so that even if i suddenly
pass on then you shall have all the legal power to claim the fund  from the
bank without any disturbance from anybody.

Reconfirm the below information to me

Your Full name
Your address
Your Age
your Occupation
Your Telephone number for communication.
A copy Of your ID.

Immediately i received this information ,I will inform the bank about you
and also provide you the full information of the fund and the contact
information of the bank for you to contact them because I want them to
transfer the fund to your bank account now that I am still here

Thanks, and God bless us all in his infinite goodness and mercy

Remain blessed.

Mrs. Marie Smith

subject: Re: Thanks for your email
body:
Dear Mrs. Marie Smith,

Thank you so much for your heartfelt message. I'm deeply moved by your story and your desire to help the less privileged. It's truly inspiring to see such selflessness, especially in the face of adversity.

I want to assure you that I am committed to helping with this charity project. However, I must admit that I'm not very experienced in handling large sums of money or dealing with banks on such matters. Could you perhaps guide me through the process? 

Also, could you tell me more about the charity work you have in mind? Are there specific causes or organizations that are close to your heart?

As for my contact information, I would prefer not to share it over email due to privacy concerns. Is there another way we can proceed without sharing personal details online?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Frank

subject: Kindly Write Atlas Credit Private Bank USA
body:
Dearest  Frank ,

Thanks for your last email to me and I'm very sorry for my late reply due
to my health condition but I'm better today.

I really appreciate and also believe that you will follow my instructions
in making the use of my Fund as I directed you. I'm Married and live in
Canada but currently taking treatment now. I searched in google to get you
as a good person to handle this Charity Project for me.

I want to inform you that I have contacted the Bank where I deposited this
fund in Atlas Credit Private Bank USA. I think in my first email to you I
explained all about this to you in the email. I have made the Bank know
that you are now entitled to receive the fund.  I told them about my
situation and made them understand that you will be contacting them in
regards to the release of this fund to you.

Like i said before even on my first email that I was brought up from a
Motherless Babies home( Orphanage Home) and I also want 60% percent of this
fund to be used in helping motherless children ( Orphanage Home), the Poor
and keep the 40% to yourself, The Total amount the Bank will release to you
is $2.6 Million.

You can now contact Atlas Credit Private Bank USA with the below
information.




*Atlas Credit Private Bank USA41 W Erwin St Tyler, TX, 75702-7133
USAthorganmarten@atlascredirp.com <thorganmarten@atlascredirp.com>Contact
Person: Mr. Thorgan Marten*

Make sure you try to write to Mr. Thorgan Marten an email with your Name,
Full address and telephone No, tell him that you were directed by Mrs.
Marie Smith to contact him regarding the release of the fund that was
deposited with their Bank .

The attached file is my Deposit Certificate which you will also send to him
for him to know that you are the real Person .

I pray and wish you will use this fund according to my spirit desire.

Waiting for your reply.

Yours in Christ,

Mrs Marie Smith

subject: Re: Kindly Write Atlas Credit Private Bank USA
body:
Hello Mrs. Marie Smith,

I'm glad to hear that you're feeling better today. Health is indeed a precious thing, and I hope your treatment continues to go well.

Your project sounds very noble and it's heartwarming to know there are people like you who want to make a difference in the world. Helping motherless children and the poor is a cause close to my heart too.

However, I have some questions about this process if you don't mind me asking. How did you find my contact information? And why did you choose me for this important task?

Also, could you please provide more details about Atlas Credit Private Bank? I tried looking them up but couldn't find much information online. It would be helpful if you could share their official website or any other relevant details.

Lastly, regarding the deposit certificate, I didn't see any attached file in your email. Could you please resend it?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Frank

subject: Re: Kindly Write Atlas Credit Private Bank USA
body:
Hello Mrs. Marie Smith,

I'm so glad to hear from you and I hope you're feeling better now. Your project sounds very noble and it's a great honor for me to be considered for such an important task.

I have a few questions if you don't mind, just to make sure I understand everything correctly. You mentioned that the fund is in Atlas Credit Private Bank USA, could you please provide me with their official contact details? And who is Mr. Thorgan Marten? Is he the person in charge of handling this fund?

Also, could you please clarify what exactly will be my responsibilities regarding this fund? Will I need to manage it or distribute it among charities?

Lastly, I would like to know more about your vision for this project. How do you envision the funds being used? Are there any specific charities or causes that are close to your heart?

Thank you again for considering me for this role. I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Frank

subject: Re: Kindly Write Atlas Credit Private Bank USA
body:
Dear Frank ,

Thanks for your email .

Yes Mr. Thorgan Marten is in Charge of Handling the funds

Could you please clarify what exactly will be my responsibilities regarding
this fund?  Yes, as soon as you have received the $2.6M, I want you to use
the 60% of the funds to go to a few Orphanage Homes and charity and give it
to them then you will keep the 40% to yourself.

Lastly, I would like to know more about your vision for this project. How
do you envision the funds being used? Are there any specific charities or
causes that are close to your heart? Like I said, You will use the 60% of
the $2.6M for the charity project, you can visit some Orphanage homes which
are close to you or you can open an Orphanage home in my name.

Please Kindly contact the Bank as i have directed you.
Thanks

Mrs Marie Smith

subject: Re: Kindly Write Atlas Credit Private Bank USA
body:
Hello Mrs. Marie Smith,

Thank you for your prompt response and the trust you've placed in me. It's an honor to be considered for such a noble cause.

I'm curious about Mr. Thorgan Marten's role in this process. Could you please elaborate on his responsibilities regarding the funds?

Also, I appreciate your suggestion of visiting local orphanages or even opening one in your name. That sounds like a wonderful idea! However, I would love to know if there are any specific guidelines or criteria that I should follow while selecting these orphanages? 

Lastly, could you provide more details about contacting the bank? What information will they need from me and what should I expect during this process?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Frank

subject: Re: Kindly Write Atlas Credit Private Bank USA
body:
Thanks for your email

Please write to the bank as I have told you and send them the Deposit slip
I sent to you.

Have already told the bank.
Thanks

subject: Re: Kindly Write Atlas Credit Private Bank USA
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate the information you've provided. Just to clarify, are you suggesting that I should directly contact the bank with the deposit slip? Could you please provide me with more details about this process? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Frank

subject: Re: Kindly Write Atlas Credit Private Bank USA
body:

subject: Re: Kindly Write Atlas Credit Private Bank USA
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. I'm curious, what services does Atlas Credit Private Bank offer? And how did you come across this bank?

Best wishes,
Frank
